citeinfo.origin: U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), EROS Data Center, Alaska Field Office
citeinfo.title: Alaska Interim Land Cover Mapping

descript.abstract: Data Type: Vegetation/Land Cover/Soils; Statewide landcover mapping effort to produce regional scale landcover mapping over the entire state using Landsat satellite data. This project integrated a variety of landcover mapping efforts conducted by a variety of state and federal agencies for a variety of resource inventory projects. Mapping classifications were crosswalked in attempts to standardize land mapping units.

idinfo.accconst: Not all data are available. Contact USGS ESIC office for detailed availability information .
idinfo.useconst: For regional application only due to coarse resolution. No accuracy assessment was performed on component parts.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
